com.diagnal.engage.firebase

Class Messenger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.diagnal.engage.firebase.Messenger

  • public class Messenger
extends java.lang.Object
    The Engage Firebase Messenger singleton that wraps remote messaging and provides methods for easy integration of push notification.

    Applications can get an instance of this class by calling getInstance().

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Get a singleton instance of Messenger class.

      Inform the Engage SDK that a Push Notification Campaign has been received.
      void setRemoteMessageListener(RemoteMessageListener remoteMessageListener)
